ygData.subject: Re: A new /who command (OT)
ygData.msgSnippet: ... My guild is the New Outriders . I use the /who command every time I log on to easily find out who is on in my guild. I just type this: /who all new and it
ygData.messageBody:
> As an addition, I've always had problems finding my guildmates for one of
> the guilds that I belong to. Someone tried convincing me that there was a
> "/who all guild" command, but that certainly doesn't work.

My guild is the "New Outriders". I use the /who command every time I log on
to easily find out who is on in my guild. I just type this: /who all new and
it gives me the names of all my guildmates who are not anonymous. It also
gives me anyone with the word "new" in their name too, but i've noticed
there aren't a lot of characters with new in their name.

Brangwen Incantare <New Outriders>
L24, Lady Wood Elf Bard, The Rathe
===========================
